question: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ
answer: And surely We will test you

question: لَأَرَيْنَاكَهُمْ
answer: surely, We could show them to you

question: يَسْأَلْكُمُوهَا
answer: He were to ask you for it

question: وَسُقُوا
answer: and they will be given to drink

question: أَضَلَّ
answer: He will cause to be lost

question: يُضِلَّ
answer: He will cause to be lost

question: وَأَضَلَّ
answer: and He will cause to be lost

question: وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ
answer: but surely, you will know them

question: لَانْتَصَرَ
answer: surely, He could have taken retribution
